name: Energy Ball
description: You draw in power from nature in a concentrated ball that you send towards a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing 2d8 + MOVE grass damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the next attack against the target is rolled at advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
